name: Pumkeye (Demo)
description:
A small team of three strangers that met on Discord one day decided to join a game jam together called Devtober 2022. This is our project , we hope you enjoy this small 2D platformer. 

We ended up running short on time, and were not able to fully finish it on time. I don't know what will happen with this game, maybe we'll come back and update the ending, but for now this is what we have.

sincerely

nates.not.cool
